subject: Just Released: Shippit’s 2025 State of Shipping Report ?

Hi Atto,

The 2025 State of Shipping Report from Shippit is here—and it’s a must-read for ecommerce leaders navigating rising consumer expectations, faster fulfillment needs, and competitive pressure from global giants.

Athos Commerce (powered by Searchspring, Klevu, and Intelligent Reach) is proud to contribute to this year’s report. Alongside the latest data and expert insights, we’ve shared how brands can use intelligent discovery tools to drive better shipping outcomes—from conversion to delivery.

? Get the report
(https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVNkR149k0BnW44bhhR5G5958W6YVQGc5z0vsZN2z6H2l3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3nHW2DL12K7JXjk3W9246By7-bKv7W3ZZGdL2G4rf6W2DgxmB6j4hz8W5lHWNb5x-lSDW1RmXQt5BpdsYW5NCzXy86XvJzW8WpZW64hF-LkN5PXCYY3pL-ZW3CjfZR3ftSdFW2TBWRj96RJH2W2HT5ls75P_l7N2mYrRHh1YtGW2VycDt9dpNJyW2vsp3g969SftW5vv8NB1YT-jsW7DRWdq8GFqqDW5K5n668ymV88W67nQtL22DF5mVWWYvK4h9951W1_qWr07gp7D8W8SkwKs8xCXWHf8h52NP04 )

Why download it?

With same-day delivery costs dropping and 83% of retailers pushing for global expansion, this report unpacks:

- Where top brands are investing in 2025
- How major players like Temu, Shein, and Amazon are reshaping logistics
- What AI and automation will mean for fulfillment at scale

How Search, Merchandising, and Personalisation Can Impact Shipping:

Here are 3 ways you can use ecommerce discovery tools to improve shipping and fulfillment outcomes:

? Merchandise for fulfillment-first experiences

Boost or badge products with free, express, or click & collect shipping to drive faster conversions.

? Personalise based on shopper preferences

Tailor recommendations and promotions based on product availability and upsell high-converting products during the checkout process.

? Align promotions with real delivery timelines

Sync campaigns with shipping ETA’s including regional capabilities to set accurate expectations.

Now is the time to optimise your tech stack before peak season hits. This report is your starting point.

? Download it free
(https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVNkR149k0BnW44bhhR5G5958W6YVQGc5z0vsZN2z6H2l3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3nHW2DL12K7JXjk3W9246By7-bKv7W3ZZGdL2G4rf6W2DgxmB6j4hz8W5lHWNb5x-lSDW1RmXQt5BpdsYW5NCzXy86XvJzW8WpZW64hF-LkN5PXCYY3pL-ZW3CjfZR3ftSdFW2TBWRj96RJH2W2HT5ls75P_l7N2mYrRHh1YtGW2VycDt9dpNJyW2vsp3g969SftW5vv8NB1YT-jsW7DRWdq8GFqqDW5K5n668ymV88W67nQtL22DF5mVWWYvK4h9951W1_qWr07gp7D8W8SkwKs8xCXWHf8h52NP04 )
